snippet.title: Pamali Indonesian Folklore Horror #3: The Little Devil | Game Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Pamali - The Little Devil is available now on Steam! http://bit.ly/pamali_FL03

Pamali is an Indonesian folklore horror game where choices are a crucial element in defining the journey you'll get. See how the myth, taboo, and culture of Indonesian society shape the horror itself.

In the third folklore, you'll get to play as a filial daughter named Putri. One day, Putri must go to her grandfather's house and pawn her inheritance in order to pay for her father's medication bill. She can choose to solve the puzzle to retrieve the wealth, or to reveal the mysteries behind the seemingly haunted house.

Take a taste of Putri’s life as she realizes that The Little Devil may be the reason behind her family's ordeal.

Follow us:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/854570/Pamali_Indonesian_Folklore_Horror/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pamaligame/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pamaligame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StoryTaleDev
